name: IOUserAudioControl
desc: The base class for audio control objects.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Initializes an instance of an audio control.

items.name: - GetClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the object.

items.name: - GetBaseClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the base class object.

items.name: - GetControlScope
items.desc: Returns the control’s scope: input, output, global, or play-through.

items.name: - GetIsSettable
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that idicates if the control can be set.
